verses.verse: Yisra'EL <WH3478> is an empty <WH1238> <WH8802> vine <WH1612>, he bringeth forth <WH7737> <WH8762> fruit <WH6529> unto himself: according to the multitude <WH7230> of his fruit <WH6529> he hath increased <WH7235> <WH8689> the altars <WH4196>; according to the goodness <WH2896> of his land <WH776> they have made goodly <WH2895> <WH8689> images <WH4676>.

Their heart <WH3820> is divided <WH2505> <WH8804>; now shall they be found faulty <WH816> <WH8799>: he shall break down <WH6202> <WH8799> their altars <WH4196>, he shall spoil <WH7703> <WH8779> their images <WH4676>.
For now they shall say <WH559> <WH8799>, We have no king <WH4428>, because we feared <WH3372> <WH8804> not the YY <WH3068>; what then should a king <WH4428> do <WH6213> <WH8799> to us?

They have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> words <WH1697>, swearing <WH422> <WH8800> falsely <WH7723> in making <WH3772> <WH8800> a covenant <WH1285>: thus judgment <WH4941> springeth up <WH6524> <WH8804> as hemlock <WH7219> in the furrows <WH8525> of the field <WH7704>.

The inhabitants <WH7934> of SHomron <WH8111> shall fear <WH1481> <WH8799> because of the calves <WH5697> of Bethaven <WH1007>: for the people <WH5971> thereof shall mourn <WH56> <WH8804> over it, and the Kohanim <WH3649> thereof that rejoiced <WH1523> <WH8799> on it, for the glory <WH3519> thereof, because it is departed <WH1540> <WH8804> from it.

It shall be also carried <WH2986> <WH8714> unto Ashur <WH804> for a present <WH4503> to king <WH4428> Jareb <WH3377>: Efrayim <WH669> shall receive <WH3947> <WH8799> shame <WH1317>, and Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799> of his own counsel <WH6098>.
As for SHomron <WH8111>, her king <WH4428> is cut off <WH1820> <WH8738> as the foam <WH7110> upon <WH6440> the water <WH4325>.

The high places <WH1116> also of Aven <WH206>, the sin <WH2403> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, shall be destroyed <WH8045> <WH8738>: the tshofar <WH6975> and the thistle <WH1863> shall come up <WH5927> <WH8799> on their altars <WH4196>; and they shall say <WH559> <WH8804> to the mountains <WH2022>, Cover <WH3680> <WH8761> us; and to the hills <WH1389>, Fall <WH5307> <WH8798> on us.

O Yisra'EL <WH3478>, thou hast sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> from the days <WH3117> of Giv`ah <WH1390>: there they stood <WH5975> <WH8804>: the battle <WH4421> in Giv`ah <WH1390> against the children <WH1121> of iniquity <WH5932> did not overtake <WH5381> <WH8686> them.

It is in my desire <WH185> that I should chastise <WH3256> <WH8799> them; and the people <WH5971> shall be gathered <WH622> <WH8795> against them, when they shall bind <WH631> <WH8800> themselves in their two <WH8147> furrows <WH5869>.

And Efrayim <WH669> is as an heifer <WH5697> that is taught <WH3925> <WH8794>, and loveth <WH157> <WH8802> to tread out <WH1758> <WH8800> the corn; but I passed over <WH5674> <WH8804> upon her fair <WH2898> neck <WH6677>: I will make Efrayim <WH669> to ride <WH7392> <WH8686>; Y'hudah <WH3063> shall plow <WH2790> <WH8799>, and Ya`akov <WH3290> shall break his clods <WH7702> <WH8762>.

Sow <WH2232> <WH8798> to yourselves in righteousness <WH6666>, reap <WH7114> <WH8798> in <WH6310> mercy <WH2617>; break up <WH5214> <WH8798> your fallow ground <WH5215>: for it is time <WH6256> to seek <WH1875> <WH8800> the YY <WH3068>, till he come <WH935> <WH8799> and rain <WH3384> <WH8686> righteousness <WH6664> upon you.

Ye have plowed <WH2790> <WH8804> wickedness <WH7562>, ye have reaped <WH7114> <WH8804> iniquity <WH5766>; ye have eaten <WH398> <WH8804> the fruit <WH6529> of lies <WH3585>: because thou didst trust <WH982> <WH8804> in thy way <WH1870>, in the multitude <WH7230> of thy mighty men <WH1368>.

Therefore shall a tumult <WH7588> arise <WH6965> <WH8804> among thy people <WH5971>, and all thy fortresses <WH4013> shall be spoiled <WH7703> <WH8714>, as Shalman <WH8020> spoiled <WH7701> Betharbel <WH1009> in the day <WH3117> of battle <WH4421>: the mother <WH517> was dashed in pieces <WH7376> <WH8795> upon her children <WH1121>.

So <WH3602> shall Beit-El <WH1008> do <WH6213> <WH8804> unto you because <WH6440> of your great <WH7451> wickedness <WH7451>: in a morning <WH7837> shall the king <WH4428> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> utterly <WH1820> <WH8736> be cut off <WH1820> <WH8738>.
